channel.title: Chrismas event
channel.description:
hey i got the new chrismas events right but i got models and ints but where do i put ints the models arnt thre look
[code]if(i == 13330) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12065; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12066; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12066; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 900; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Christmas Ghost Hood"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "This robe hood has been hewn from bedsheets and wrapped in chains.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code] [code]if(i == 13331) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12067; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Christmas Ghost Top"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "This robe top has been hewn from bedsheets and wrapped in chains.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code] [code]if(i == 13332) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12069; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12070; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12070; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 900; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Christmas Ghost Bottoms"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "These robe bottoms have been hewn from bedsheets and wrapped in chains.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code] [code]if(i == 13333) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name class8.aStringArray189[2] = "Spin"; // String name class8.anInt174 = 12071; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12072; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12072; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; @nikolaww3 wrote:

hey i got the new chrismas events right but i got models and ints but where do i put ints the models arnt thre look

if(i == 13330) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12065; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12066; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12066; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 900; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Christmas Ghost Hood"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "This robe hood has been hewn from bedsheets and wrapped in chains.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
